keyMappings:
unmap x
unmap X

map y copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map J scrollLeft
map K scrollRight

map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp

# map P togglePinTab

map s Vomnibar.activate
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map z Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map S Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map T Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
searchEngines:
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
i: http://www.imdb.com/find?q=%s IMDB
l: https://lucidlife.wordpress.com/?s=%s LucidLife
r: https://www.reddit.com/search?q=%s Reddit
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
